TopicTitle: Joshwoo70's random mods! Infinate RTG and more!

Articles.Content:
This will not be the final updates to this thread some others will be coming alone as well here are the mods currently:

([ALL MODS REQUIRES MODULEMANAGER](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55219-Module-Manager-1-5-6-%28Jan-6%29))

Infinite <abbr title="Radio-isotope Thermo-electric Generator (a.k.a. Mars rover heating device)">RTG</abbr>:

cheat part!

Ever hate those Kerbaltek Hyperedit sliders that were in the misc page?

We did got bored of it and decided to make a mod to remedy it!

License: GNU GPL 2

all changes are in github as commits!

**T.A.P.E (totally aw=sum parts epicenter?)**

Personally used by sir\_afrodite / digitalpsychosis

changes the name of strut to TAPE and EAS to TAS

License: GNU GPL 2

Pre 1.0 nukes!

ever want to port your save file that have old nuke tugs that use <abbr title="Liquid Fuel and Oxidizer">LFO</abbr>?

now you can!

(warranty is voided when installed)

License:GNU GPL 2

Misc patches!(does not really work.)

Currently contains RT all the command modules and a progression breaking <abbr title="Stability Augmentation System">sas</abbr> module changer.

License:GNU GPL 2

Downloads Page!

[Main (Github)](https://github.com/Joshwoo69/JWpatches/releases)

<abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> (kinda indexed)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-27T02:21:13Z" title="06/27/2016 02:21  AM" data-short="8 yr">June 27, 2016</time> by Joshwoo70**
  
RIP KS

Looking at your cfg, I think your alittle mixed up you have them outputting the resource ? Did you mean input resource ? You do know you can have both on it a input and output ?

EDIT- Or you just wanted to have a more less cheat part ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T16:55:46Z" title="08/06/2015 04:55  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

> 
> Looking at your cfg, I think your alittle mixed up you have them outputting the resource ? Did you mean input resource ? You do know you can have both on it a input and output ?
> EDIT- Or you just wanted to have a more less cheat part ?

Yes i know. This is a cheat part. For the TAC config i decided to draw out all the waste and add in all the good stuff.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-25T04:41:50Z" title="09/25/2015 04:41  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 25, 2015</time> by Joshwoo69**
Can you make it a tweakable?

>

With tweakscale?

Done!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T06:54:23Z" title="08/09/2015 06:54  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by Joshwoo69**
I don't understand what the "Infinite RTG" thing is supposed to do. Can you clarify what it does and why it is named that?

> 
> I don't understand what the "Infinite RTG" thing is supposed to do. Can you clarify what it does and why it is named that?

It makes infinate resources...

However.. it is not like squad debug menu infinate fuel. As some other mods use custom plugins to use the resources. So infinite fuel does not work.

It works as a rtg texture that is able to be right clicked and access the menu..

TLDR it is a generator module that adds has a big number. To add resources to the craft (tanks not included!!)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T01:50:05Z" title="08/11/2015 01:50  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by Joshwoo69**
new mod.. fixed some stuff so update.
